name: Verico Brokers For Life Inc.
tag_list: mortgage-broker, broker, brokers, mortgage, commercial-mortgage, mortgage-pre-approval, first-time-home-buyers, mortgage-calculators, mortgage-renewal, mortgage-rates
overview:
A member of the Verico Independent Broker Network, Brokers for Life is owned and operated by Len and Margie Lane. We represent to you our valued customers, borrowing opportunities with over a dozen key lenders in the mortgage industry.

We have worked hard at building a team of dedicated mortgage associates who we believe have your best interest at heart. We continually work at helping our team become better at their profession so that we can ensure that you receive the best mortgage or loan for your life style.

Every mortgage situation is different, with different issues and opportunities. That’s why we consider our slogan “”Real Life Mortgage Solutions”” to represent what it is we do for you, our valued customers, every day.
